clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of Prevalence of Loss of Appetite in Subject With Health Disorders
clinical_study.official_title: Survey of Prevalence of Loss of Appetite in Subject With Health Disorders.

brief_summary.textblock: The study is an epidemiological survey to find out the incidence of loss of appetite in Indian patients suffering from various health disorders. This survey will be conducted to obtain information on appetite from a total of 17500 subjects This study does not intend to study the effect of any drugs. The primary source of information will be the subjects themselves. The study will be conducted at 275 - 350 centres spread across India.This is a single visit study.The physician will conduct routine clinical, physical and general examination.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with loss of appetite

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of fatigue among the patients with respect to disease
Percentage of patients with moderate to very severe Fatigue.

intervention.description: No intervention will be given to subjects, survey of loss of appetite in patients suffering from various healthcare disorders.
